Text: You're sitting in you're office ready to go home for the day| but someone confidently swings open the door.

Speaker: Frank
Text: Hey boss! You see the report I gave you on the project?

Speaker: You
Text: I did see the results Frank| nice work. But noticed something on the report.

Speaker: You
Text: You've taken full credit of the project| but Olivia and Wilson were responsible for a majority of it.

Speaker: Frank
Text: Well you know me| I make a lot of decisions| and just like you| guide the team to great results.

Speaker: Frank
Text: In short| they followed my lead so I should get the credit.
